attributes.action: London riots - Make these thugs pay by rebuilding their communities
attributes.additional_details:
The mindless violence seen in major cities over the last week should never happen again.

The government need to understand the root causes of why these individuals did what they did.
Giving these gang members jail sentences, will only add to the glory of their actions, as per the introduction of ASBO's.

These individuals need to pay for their actions through a selection of methods. My suggestion would be to look at methods used on Brat Camp, understanding the psychology of these individuals and their punishment would be to work with those affected communities under an expanded community service program.

Putting these individuals into prison or borstal will only introduce more hardened criminals in the future.

Those that have benefits or are in work, will need to have funds redirected to pay the communities and give back by working on these programs.
